00032 #define           NUM_BULLET_SLOTS                          50

00034 
00035 // GLOBAL FOR FACES LISTING
00036 BULLET      gBullets[ NUM_BULLET_SLOTS ];
00037 UINT32  guiNumBullets = 0;
00038 
00039 
00040 INT32 GetFreeBullet(void)
00041 {
00042       UINT32 uiCount;
00043 
00044       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumBullets; uiCount++)
00045       {
00046             if((gBullets[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE) )
00047                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00048       }
00049 
00050       if(guiNumBullets < NUM_BULLET_SLOTS )
00051             return((INT32)guiNumBullets++);
00052 
00053       return(-1);
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 void RecountBullets(void)
00058 {
00059       INT32 uiCount;
00060 
00061       for(uiCount=guiNumBullets-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00062       {
00063             if( ( gBullets[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00064             {
00065                   guiNumBullets=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00066                   return;
00067             }
00068       }
00069       guiNumBullets = 0;
00070 }

00072 
00073 INT32 CreateBullet( UINT8 ubFirerID, BOOLEAN fFake, UINT16 usFlags,UINT16 fromItem )
00074 {
00075       INT32             iBulletIndex;
00076       BULLET            *pBullet;
00077 
00078       if( ( iBulletIndex = GetFreeBullet() )==(-1) )
00079             return(-1);
00080 
00081       memset(&gBullets[ iBulletIndex ], 0, sizeof( BULLET ) );
00082 
00083       pBullet = &gBullets[ iBulletIndex ];
00084 
00085       pBullet->iBullet = iBulletIndex;
00086       pBullet->fAllocated = TRUE;
00087       pBullet->fLocated       = FALSE;
00088       pBullet->ubFirerID      = ubFirerID;
00089       pBullet->usFlags        = usFlags;
00090       pBullet->usLastStructureHit = 0;
00091       pBullet->fromItem = fromItem;
00092 
00093       if (fFake)
00094       {
00095             pBullet->fReal = FALSE;
00096       }
00097       else
00098       {
00099             pBullet->fReal = TRUE;
00100       }
00101 
00102       return( iBulletIndex );
00103 }

00106 void HandleBulletSpecialFlags( INT32 iBulletIndex )
00107 {
00108       BULLET            *pBullet;
00109       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00110       FLOAT       dX, dY;
00111       UINT8       ubDirection;
00112 
00113       pBullet = &( gBullets[ iBulletIndex ] );
00114 
00115       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00116 
00117       if ( pBullet->fReal )
00118       {
00119             // Create ani tile if this is a spit!
00120             if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00121             {
00122                   AniParams.sGridNo                                     = (INT16)pBullet->sGridNo;
00123                   AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00124                   AniParams.sDelay                                      = 100;
00125                   AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 3;
00126                   AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_LOOPING | ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME;
00127                   AniParams.sX                                                      = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX );
00128                   AniParams.sY                                                      = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY );
00129                   AniParams.sZ                                                      = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
00130 
00131                   if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT ) )
00132                   {
00133                         strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\SPIT2.STI" );
00134                   }
00135                   else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00136                   {
00137                         strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\KNIFING.STI" );
00138                         pBullet->ubItemStatus = pBullet->pFirer->inv[ HANDPOS ].bStatus[0];
00139                   }
00140 
00141                   // Get direction to use for this guy....
00142                   dX = ( (FLOAT)( pBullet->qIncrX ) / FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION );
00143                   dY = ( (FLOAT)( pBullet->qIncrY ) / FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION );
00144 
00145                   ubDirection = atan8( 0, 0, (INT16)( dX * 100 ), (INT16)( dY * 100 ) );
00146 
00147                   AniParams.uiUserData3                           = ubDirection;
00148 
00149                   pBullet->pAniTile = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00150 
00151                   // IF we are anything that needs a shadow.. set it here....
00152                   if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00153                   {
00154                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL;
00155                         AniParams.sZ                                                      = 0;                    
00156                         pBullet->pShadowAniTile                   = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00157                   }
00158 
00159             }
00160       }
00161 }

00163 
00164 void RemoveBullet( INT32 iBullet )
00165 {
00166       CHECKV( iBullet < NUM_BULLET_SLOTS );
00167 
00168       // decrease soldier's bullet count
00169       
00170       if (gBullets[ iBullet ].fReal)
00171       {
00172             // set to be deleted at next update
00173             gBullets[ iBullet ].fToDelete = TRUE;
00174 
00175             // decrement reference to bullet in the firer
00176             gBullets[ iBullet ].pFirer->bBulletsLeft--;
00177             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Ending bullet, bullets left %d", gBullets[ iBullet ].pFirer->bBulletsLeft ) );
00178 
00179             if ( gBullets[ iBullet ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00180             {
00181                   // Delete ani tile
00182                   if ( gBullets[ iBullet ].pAniTile != NULL )
00183                   {
00184                         DeleteAniTile( gBullets[ iBullet ].pAniTile );
00185                         gBullets[ iBullet ].pAniTile = NULL;
00186                   }
00187 
00188                   // Delete shadow
00189                   if ( gBullets[ iBullet ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00190                   {
00191                         if ( gBullets[ iBullet ].pShadowAniTile != NULL )
00192                         {
00193                               DeleteAniTile( gBullets[ iBullet ].pShadowAniTile );
00194                               gBullets[ iBullet ].pShadowAniTile = NULL;
00195                         }
00196                   }
00197             }
00198       }
00199       else
00200       {
00201             // delete this fake bullet right away!
00202             gBullets[ iBullet ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00203             RecountBullets();
00204       }
00205 }
00206 
00207 void LocateBullet( INT32 iBulletIndex )
00208 {
00209       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_MISSES ] )
00210       {
00211         // Check if a bad guy fired!
00212         if ( gBullets[ iBulletIndex ].ubFirerID != NOBODY )
00213         {
00214               if ( MercPtrs[ gBullets[ iBulletIndex ].ubFirerID ]->bSide == gbPlayerNum )
00215               {
00216                     if ( !gBullets[ iBulletIndex ].fLocated )
00217                     {
00218                           gBullets[ iBulletIndex ].fLocated = TRUE;
00219 
00220                           //Only if we are in turnbased and noncombat
00221                           if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
00222                           {
00223                                 LocateGridNo( (INT16)gBullets[ iBulletIndex ].sGridNo );
00224                           }
00225                     }
00226               }
00227         }
00228   }
00229 }

00231 
00232 void UpdateBullets( )
00233 {
00234       UINT32                              uiCount;
00235       LEVELNODE                     *pNode;
00236       BOOLEAN                             fDeletedSome = FALSE;
00237 
00238       for ( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumBullets; uiCount++ )
00239       {
00240             if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated)
00241             {
00242                   if (gBullets[ uiCount ].fReal && !( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & BULLET_STOPPED ) )
00243                   {
00244                         // there are duplicate checks for deletion in case the bullet is deleted by shooting
00245                         // someone at point blank range, in the first MoveBullet call in the FireGun code
00246                         if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].fToDelete )
00247                         {
00248                               // Remove from old position
00249                               gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00250                               fDeletedSome = TRUE;
00251                               continue;
00252                         }
00253 
00254                         //if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_HIDE_BULLETS ] ) )
00255                         {
00256                               // ALRIGHTY, CHECK WHAT TYPE OF BULLET WE ARE
00257 
00258                               if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT | BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE | BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
00259                               {
00260                               }
00261                               else
00262                               {
00263                                     RemoveStruct( gBullets[ uiCount ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE1 );
00264                                     RemoveStruct( gBullets[ uiCount ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE2 );
00265                               }
00266                         }
00267 
00268                         MoveBullet( uiCount );
00269                         if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].fToDelete )
00270                         {
00271                               // Remove from old position
00272                               gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00273                               fDeletedSome = TRUE;
00274                               continue;
00275                         }
00276 
00277                         if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & BULLET_STOPPED )
00278                         {
00279                               continue;
00280                         }
00281 
00282                         // Display bullet
00283                         //if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_HIDE_BULLETS ] ) )
00284                         {
00285                               if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00286                               {
00287                                     if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].pAniTile != NULL )
00288                                     {
00289                                           gBullets[ uiCount ].pAniTile->sRelativeX  = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrX );
00290                                           gBullets[ uiCount ].pAniTile->sRelativeY  = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrY );
00291                                           gBullets[ uiCount ].pAniTile->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ  = (INT16) CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrZ ) );
00292 
00293                                           if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE ) )
00294                                           {
00295                                                 gBullets[ uiCount ].pShadowAniTile->sRelativeX  = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrX );
00296                                                 gBullets[ uiCount ].pShadowAniTile->sRelativeY  = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrY );
00297                                           }
00298 
00299                                     }
00300                               }
00301                               // Are we a missle?
00302                               else if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT ) )
00303                               {
00304                               }
00305                               else if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
00306                               {
00307                                     ManLooksForOtherTeams(gBullets[ uiCount ].pFirer);
00308                               }
00309                               else
00310                               {
00311                                     pNode = AddStructToTail( gBullets[ uiCount ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE1 );
00312                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00313                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00314                                     pNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS | LEVELNODE_IGNOREHEIGHT );
00315                                     pNode->sRelativeX = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrX );
00316                                     pNode->sRelativeY = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrY );
00317                                     pNode->sRelativeZ = (INT16) CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrZ ) );
00318 
00319                                     // Display shadow
00320                                     pNode = AddStructToTail( gBullets[ uiCount ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE2 );
00321                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00322                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00323                                     pNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS | LEVELNODE_IGNOREHEIGHT );
00324                                     pNode->sRelativeX = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrX );
00325                                     pNode->sRelativeY = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( gBullets[ uiCount ].qCurrY );
00326                                     pNode->sRelativeZ = (INT16)gpWorldLevelData[ gBullets[ uiCount ].sGridNo ].sHeight;
00327                               }
00328                         }
00329                   }
00330                   else 
00331                   {
00332                         if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].fToDelete )
00333                         {
00334                               gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00335                               fDeletedSome = TRUE;
00336                         }
00337                   }     
00338             }
00339       }
00340 
00341       if ( fDeletedSome )
00342       {
00343             RecountBullets( );
00344       }
00345 }

00360 
00361 void AddMissileTrail( BULLET *pBullet, FIXEDPT qCurrX, FIXEDPT qCurrY, FIXEDPT qCurrZ )
00362 {
00363       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00364 
00365       // If we are a small missle, don't show
00366       if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT | BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
00367       {
00368             if ( pBullet->iLoop < 5 )
00369             {
00370                   return;
00371             }
00372       }
00373 
00374       // If we are a small missle, don't show
00375       if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON ) )
00376       {
00377             //if ( pBullet->iLoop < 40 )
00378             //{
00379                   return;
00380             //}
00381       }
00382 
00383 
00384       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00385       AniParams.sGridNo                                     = (INT16)pBullet->sGridNo;
00386       AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00387       AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 + Random( 100 ) );
00388       AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
00389       AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
00390       AniParams.sX                                                      = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX );
00391       AniParams.sY                                                      = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY );
00392       AniParams.sZ                                                      = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ ) );
00393 
00394 
00395       if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON ) )
00396       {
00397             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\MSLE_SMK.STI" );
00398       }
00399       else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE ) )
00400       {
00401             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\MSLE_SMA.STI" );
00402       }
00403       else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT ) )
00404       {
00405             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\MSLE_SPT.STI" );
00406       }
00407       else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_FLAME ) )
00408       {
00409             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\FLMTHR2.STI" );
00410             AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 );
00411       }
00412       else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
00413       {
00414             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\BULLET_TRACER.STI" );
00415             AniParams.uiFlags |= ANITILE_LIGHT;
00416             if ( pBullet->pFirer->bLevel > 0 ) // if firer on roof then
00417             {
00418                   if ( FindBuilding(AniParams.sGridNo) != NULL ) // if this spot is still within the building's grid area
00419                   {
00420                         AniParams.uiFlags &= ~ANITILE_LIGHT;
00421                   }
00422             }
00423       }
00424 
00425       CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00426 
00427 }

00430 BOOLEAN SaveBulletStructureToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00431 {
00432       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
00433       UINT16      usCnt;
00434       UINT32      uiBulletCount=0;
00435 
00436       //loop through and count the number of bullets
00437       for( usCnt=0; usCnt<NUM_BULLET_SLOTS; usCnt++ )
00438       {
00439             //if the bullet is active, save it
00440             if( gBullets[ usCnt ].fAllocated )
00441             {
00442                   uiBulletCount++;
00443             }
00444       }
00445 
00446       //Save the number of Bullets in the array
00447       FileWrite( hFile, &uiBulletCount, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00448       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00449       {
00450             return( FALSE );
00451       }
00452 
00453       if( uiBulletCount != 0 )
00454       {
00455             for( usCnt=0; usCnt<NUM_BULLET_SLOTS; usCnt++ )
00456             {
00457                   //if the bullet is active, save it
00458                   if( gBullets[ usCnt ].fAllocated )
00459                   {
00460                         //Save the the Bullet structure
00461                         FileWrite( hFile, &gBullets[usCnt], sizeof( BULLET ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00462                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BULLET ) )
00463                         {
00464                               return( FALSE );
00465                         }
00466                   }
00467             }
00468       }
00469 
00470       return( TRUE );
00471 }
00472 
00473 
00474 BOOLEAN LoadBulletStructureFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00475 {
00476       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00477       UINT16      usCnt;
00478 
00479       //make sure the bullets are not allocated
00480       memset( gBullets, 0, NUM_BULLET_SLOTS * sizeof( BULLET ) );
00481 
00482       //Load the number of Bullets in the array
00483       FileRead( hFile, &guiNumBullets, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00484       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00485       {
00486             return( FALSE );
00487       }
00488 
00489       for( usCnt=0; usCnt<guiNumBullets; usCnt++ )
00490       {
00491             //Load the the Bullet structure
00492             FileRead( hFile, &gBullets[usCnt], sizeof( BULLET ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00493             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BULLET ) )
00494             {
00495                   return( FALSE );
00496             }
00497 
00498             //Set some parameters 
00499             gBullets[usCnt].uiLastUpdate = 0;
00500             if( gBullets[usCnt].ubFirerID != NOBODY )
00501                   gBullets[usCnt].pFirer = &Menptr[ gBullets[usCnt].ubFirerID ];
00502             else
00503                   gBullets[usCnt].pFirer = NULL;
00504 
00505             gBullets[usCnt].pAniTile = NULL;
00506             gBullets[usCnt].pShadowAniTile = NULL;
00507             gBullets[usCnt].iBullet = usCnt;
00508 
00509             HandleBulletSpecialFlags( gBullets[usCnt].iBullet );
00510       }
00511 
00512       return( TRUE );
00513 }
00514 
00515 void StopBullet( INT32 iBullet )
00516 {
00517       gBullets[ iBullet ].usFlags |= BULLET_STOPPED;
00518 
00519       RemoveStruct( gBullets[ iBullet ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE1 );
00520       RemoveStruct( gBullets[ iBullet ].sGridNo, BULLETTILE2 );
00521 }
00522 
00523 
00524 void DeleteAllBullets( )
00525 {
00526       UINT32                              uiCount;
00527 
00528       for ( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumBullets; uiCount++ )
00529       {
00530             if ( gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated)
00531             {
00532                   // Remove from old position
00533                   RemoveBullet( uiCount );
00534                   gBullets[ uiCount ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00535             }
00536       }
00537 
00538       RecountBullets( );
00539 
00540 }
